        public java.lang.String getAuthorizationUrl(java.lang.String oauthCallback)
        Get authorization URL, and use provided callback
        Parameters:
        oauthCallback - URL, i.e. oauth_callback used in mobile applications
        Returns:
        URL for authorizing application
